description: Advanced scaffold focused on state lifecycle, transition evaluation and dispatch handling. Variants remove core logic in specific places; LLM must fill in logic maintaining original interfaces and behavior.
expected_outcomes: Variant implementations, once filled, will produce the same state transition sequence as the ORIGINAL for the provided demo scenario.
State.on_enter must initialize timers and log; on_exit must log duration.
Transition.evaluate must return True only when the condition callable (if present) evaluates to True.
StateMachine.run must call current_state.execute(), look up transitions for that state, evaluate transition conditions, perform on_exit/on_enter calls and swap states accordingly.
notes: Original source files included in ros1_code/src/original/. Each variant file contains one TODO block. README_eval.md contains per-variant validation checklists.
